game.name: Being Pretty Bride
game.description:
Like all other brides, Nancy also looks pretty exciting and exhilarating for her special day. She has plenty of things to do during her wedding, and, for this reason, she has hired you as her personal fashion advisor. Would you like to accept this challenge and make her shine like never before? Join Being Pretty Bride and be prepared to show your intense fashion abilities to make her look like the most beautiful bride on this planet! You would spot plenty of unique bridal dresses and accessories to choose from in this brand new girls game. 

Hey ladies! The food is ready, her groom along with all her guests have already reached to the venue. Remember every eyes will be on her so try to mix and match as many wedding outfits as you can to create the awesome results. When you click the play button and enter this HTML5 dressing game, you would spot different categories on the right side of the screen. Click any item out of multiple options including hairstyles, dresses, tiaras, earrings and necklaces to find the best alternative and get her ready for the ceremony!

She has a huge faith on your fashion designer abilities so no need to be hesitated in taking as many chances as you take. Once you are done, click the next button shown on the bottom of the screen and you will be ready to see the new look of your gorgeous bride. Are you looking forward to try out more games like this? Then we recommend you to browse through our vast array of free girls games and find a suitable fun option. Good luck to have fun alone or with your friends, no download required!
